name: Suspirium
description:
- We made it playable online for convenience, but it's best played fullscreen on your computer -

What is this ?
A student project created during a game jam at Les Gobelins. The subject being "cult movies", we chose Suspiria (Dario Argento, 1977) for its atmosphere and lighting.

We tried to reproduce the claustrophobic, disorienting experience of the movie's heroine. Hope it works for you !

Controls
arrow keys or WASD : move
E or Ctrl : pick-up object/close pop-up
1, 2 and 3 : abilities unlocked during play

Team
Maša Burgic - 3D models, music
Lola B. Deswarte - 3D models, textures, additional music
Antoine Dieulesaint - gameplay, level design
Basile Mathieu - gameplay, controls
